Selected Answer: B

questions.question_text: A developer is using a Type Into activity with the input method property set to Simulate. Which property must be enabled for the activity to send a Complete event when it has finished typing and trigger a Ul response from the target application?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Selecting this check box adds a Complete event after the text entry, in order to register the action correctly.

Selected Answer: D
D is correct

https://docs.uipath.com/activities/other/latest/ui-automation/n-type-into

choices.D: Executor directs to the first activity outside "If first run, read local configuration"
choices.B: Executor directs to the "First Run" sequence
choices.A: Executor directs to the "If in_OrchestratorQ..." activity
choices.C: Executor directs to the first InitAllSettings workflow activity

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Tested in Studiio

A is the correct answer as in case of step over, the current activity or container is executed at once and it moves to the next activity of flow.

C is not the correct answer because if you press type into then only the executer will enter the invoked xaml and move the first activity.

Selected Answer: A
Tested in studio

choices.B: It should be set to the next queue item in order to be, further on, processed.
choices.A: The process will not enter the Get Transaction Data state because a linear process is not transactional.
choices.D: It should be set to Nothing because a linear process should not enter the second time in the Get Transaction Data state.
choices.C: It can be set to a static value and, in order to respect the UiPath best practices, this value should be taken from "Config.xlsx".

questions.question_text: A developer needs to use the REFramework in order to implement a linear process. Which value should be set to “out_TransactionItem” the first time when it enters the Get Transaction Data state?

discussion.content:
C is the correct answer as it is asking for the first time it enters the Get Transaction Data.

The value should not be set to nothing for the first time when it enters the Get Transaction State in order to process in case of Linear workflow implemented with RE Framework. It should be set to nothing only when it enters for the second time in the Get Transaction Data state.
